about_the_game:
"ThePoliticalUnderground" is the ultimate satirical political fighting game that throws politicians from across the spectrum into a no-holds-barred battle for supremacy. Dive into a chaotic world where debates are settled through fists, and the one with the most clout reigns supreme.

Choose from a roster of iconic political figures, each armed with their unique special moves and rhetoric. Engage in absurd combat scenarios set in familiar political landscapes, from the halls of power to the campaign trail.

Game Features:

Ridiculous Rumble Arena: Step into arenas inspired by global political hotspots. Battle amidst the chaos of a dysfunctional parliament, rally in a town hall filled with protesters, or duke it out in the Oval Office.

Politician Pugilism: Unleash hilarious and over-the-top attacks. Use filibuster flurries, mud-slinging specials, bureaucratic red tape traps, and tweetstorms to outwit and outfight opponents.

Campaign Mode: Rise through the ranks by navigating political challenges. Win debates, gain endorsements, and engage in scandalous cover-ups to cement your power.

Multiplayer Mayhem: Invite friends for local or online matches. Engage in political smackdowns and see whose policies reign supreme.

Satirical Storyline: Experience a tongue-in-cheek narrative mode where political satire meets outrageous humor. Witness politicians making alliances, breaking promises, and pulling off jaw-dropping stunts to secure votes.

Unlockable Outfits & Power-ups: Dress your politician in outlandish costumes, from superhero capes to mascot suits. Discover power-ups like spin doctor potions or lobbyist support for that extra edge.

Dynamic Commentary: Enjoy hilarious commentary from political pundits, comedians, and satirists as they analyze the chaos unfolding in the arena.

Political Parodies Galore: Encounter caricatures of real-world politicians, from larger-than-life personas to the most unlikely contenders, each with their quirks and exaggerated characteristics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or 750 Ti, or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
